title: UI does not show pre-annotated results on sequence labeling tasks
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
My import test.jsonl file is as:
```
{"text": "EU rejects German call to boycott British lamb.", "labels": [ [0, 2, "ORG"], [11, 17, "MISC"] ]}
{"text": "Peter Blackburn", "labels": [ [0, 15, "PERSON"] ]}
{"text": "President Obama", "labels": [ [10, 15, "PERSON"] ]}
```
I first created 3 labels (ORG, MISC, PERSON) in the 'Labels' interface, then I imported the data as following steps.

When I was at the stage of 'Import Dataset', I selected input format as 'JSONL', Column Data as 'text', Column Label as 'label', Encoding as 'utf-8', then I uploaded my test.jsonl file. 

After importing the file, I clicked on 'Start Annotation', and saw each line of text in the annotation tasks. However, the pre-annotated results were only shown on the right column (the 'Key Value' column), but was not shown in the task interface.

---------
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

<!-- Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: Ubuntu 20.04.2
*   Python Version Used:3.8.0
*   When you install doccano: 27.08.2021
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc):
I first installed doccano directly using 'pip install', the bug appeared. Then I tried docker-compose (the production version) in Ubuntu.
![Screenshot from 2021-08-27 15-07-03](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28050124/131133342-d9c16067-a567-42ea-a68e-adf5d337cfd5.png)
